member.name: T:GemBox.Imaging.ComponentInfo
member.summary: Contains static licensing methods and diagnostic information about executing GemBox.Imaging assembly.

member.name: E:GemBox.Imaging.ComponentInfo.FreeLimitReached
member.summary: Occurs in loading or saving when GemBox.Imaging assembly is used with FREE-LIMITED-KEY license key, and the free limit is reached.

member.name: P:GemBox.Imaging.ComponentInfo.InfoOut
member.summary: Used for outputting information logs about GemBox.Imaging.

member.name: P:GemBox.Imaging.ComponentInfo.Title
member.summary: Gets GemBox.Imaging assembly title.

member.name: P:GemBox.Imaging.ComponentInfo.FullVersion
member.summary: Gets GemBox.Imaging assembly full version.

member.name: M:GemBox.Imaging.ComponentInfo.SetLicense(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the license (serial) key.

remarks.para: You should call this method before using any other class from GemBox.Imaging assembly.
The key can only be set once (if you try another key, it will be ignored).
The best place to call this method is from a static constructor of your application's main class.
Valid serial key has multiple groups of alphanumeric characters, separated with dashes.
To use the assembly in free limited mode use, FREE-LIMITED-KEY as .
For more information about GemBox.Imaging evaluation and licensing, see evaluation and licensing.

member.value: The choice for proceeding when the free limit is reached.

member.name: P:GemBox.Imaging.FreeLimitEventArgs.Image
member.summary: Gets the image on which the limit was reached.
member.value: The image on which the limit was reached.

member.name: T:GemBox.Imaging.Image
member.summary: Represents either a single, constant set of pixels at a specific size and resolution (raster image) or a set of drawing commands (vector image).

member.value: The width of the image in pixels.

member.name: P:GemBox.Imaging.Image.DpiX
member.summary: Gets the horizontal dots per inch (dpi) of the image or .
member.value: The horizontal dots per inch (dpi) of the image; that is, the dots per inch (dpi) along the x-axis.

member.name: P:GemBox.Imaging.Image.DpiY
member.summary: Gets the vertical dots per inch (dpi) of the image or .
member.value: The vertical dots per inch (dpi) of the image; that is, the dots per inch (dpi) along the y-axis.

member.name: T:GemBox.Imaging.RotateFlipType
member.summary: Specifies how much an image is rotated and the axis used to flip the image.

member.name: F:GemBox.Imaging.RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipXY
member.summary: Specifies a 180-degree clockwise rotation followed by a horizontal and vertical flip.

member.name: F:GemBox.Imaging.RotateFlipType.RotateNoneFlipNone
member.summary: Specifies no clockwise rotation and no flipping.

member.name: F:GemBox.Imaging.RotateFlipType.Rotate270FlipXY
member.summary: Specifies a 270-degree clockwise rotation followed by a horizontal and vertical flip.

member.summary: Specifies a 90-degree clockwise rotation without flipping.
